machine_start_gcode.default_value:
M92 E159 ;2288 for V5 extruder

M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}
M104 T1 S120
M104 T2 S120
M104 T3 S120

G21
G90
M42 S255 P13 ;chamber lights
M42 S255 P12 ;fume extraction
M204 S300 ;default acceleration
M205 X10 ;default jerk

M117 Homing Y ......
G28 Y
M117 Homing X ......
G28 X
M117 Homing Z ......
G28 Z F100
G1 Z10 F600
G1 X70 Y20 F9000;go to wipe point

M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0}

M117 Heating for 50 sec.
G4 S20
M117 Heating for 30 sec.
G4 S20
M117 Heating for 10 sec.
M300 S1200 P1000
G4 S9

M117 purging nozzle....
T0
G92 E0;set E
G1 E10 F100
G92 E0
G1 E-1 F600

M117 wiping nozzle....
G1 X1 Y24 F3000
G1 X70 F9000
G1 Z10 F900

M104 T1 S21
M104 T2 S21
M104 T3 S21

M117 Printing .....

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
; -- END GCODE --
M117 cooling down....
M106 S255
M140 S5
M104 T0 S5
M104 T1 S5
M104 T2 S5
M104 T3 S5

G91
G1 Z1 F900
G90

G1 X20.0 Y260.0 F6000
G4 S7
M84
G4 S90
M107
M42 P12 S0
M42 P13 S0
M84
T0
M117 Finished.
; -- end of GCODE --
